sentences.sContent: If you need to remove an agent you will have to do it by a process of elimination.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you need to remove an agent you will have to do it by a process of elimination.
sentences.sCn: 如果您需要删除代理，将必须通过消除进程的方式进行此工作。

sentences.sContent: I recommend that you be relentless in the elimination of the backlog of defects and feature enhancements.
sentences.sContent_eng: I recommend that you be relentless in the elimination of the backlog of defects and feature enhancements.
sentences.sCn: 我建议你在消除积压的缺陷和不断膨胀的特征时毫不留情。

sentences.sContent: In all, the new president selected 150 individual programs for cuts or elimination.
sentences.sContent_eng: In all, the new president selected 150 individual programs for cuts or elimination.
sentences.sCn: 总而言之,新的总统150个人项目选择削减或者消除。

sentences.sContent: ...we suspect that spending would come down through elimination of a lot of unnecessary or even dangerous tests and treatments...
...which included the elimination of thousands of jobs...

phrases.pCn: 高斯消去法，高斯消元法

trans.tranOther: the removal or destruction of something
